channel.title: London on Jorge Cortell blog
channel.description: Recent content in London on Jorge Cortell blog

item.title: Wimbledon tournament again
item.description: The Wimbledon Tennis Tournament is here again, one more year. I can see it from my living-room window.

item.title: Apsley House, Benares and Wallace Collection
item.description: Saturday, July 1st, we went to Apsley House, Benares Indian Restaurant, and the Wallace Collection.

item.title: AWS Summit London
item.description: Last Wednesday, June 28, I was invited to the [Amazon Web Services Summit in London] (https://aws.amazon.com/summits/london/), which took place at ICC London, ExCeL.

item.title: Mind The Bridge Event in London
item.description: Last Tuesday, June 20, I was invited to participate in the launch of the Startup Europe Partnership report “[Dual Companies: How and Why European Scaleups Expand to the U.S.] (https://mindthebridge.com/european-dual-companies/)" by Mind the Bridge with the support of international law firm Wilson Sonsini Goodrich & Rosati, which took place at The Rainmaking Loft, London.

item.title: Tate and The Globe
item.description: Since we were alone for a few days, my dear wife and I went to town for a day of art at the Tate and Globe Theater.

item.title: Microsoft Partner Advisory Council
item.description: Last Tuesday, June 20, I was invited to participate in the III Microsoft Partner Advisory Council, which took place at The Hawksmoor Guildhall, London.

item.title: Two Exhibitions at the Barbican
item.description: Last Saturday, June 17, we visited a couple of exhibitions we were really interested in.
